name: Runner Party
description:
A great tournament is organized in the brand new gameroom : Runner Party!



Runner Party is a local and multiplayer Steam Remote play with diverse mechanics.

A competitive Multiplayer game up to 4 players

In a 80’s and 90’s universe, you can participate in fun races filled with platforms and filled with obstacles.

You will have many items to separate yourself from your opponents and win the race ! Get out of the screen and you will be eliminated !

Be the most responsive to win the race by winning 3 rounds !

Become a legend ! 3 ! 2 ! 1 ! Go !

A competitive Multiplayer game up to 4 players


Runner Party is in early access.
The game will evolve quickly and offer later

- 1 character editor (win and collect cards to get new skins ! Customize your character ! )

- Additional levels
- an AI to play alone
- Servers to play online
- A complete matchmaking system as well as many leagues
